org.jsoup.select

类 NodeTraversor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsoup.select.NodeTraversor

  • public class NodeTraversor
extends Object
    Depth-first node traversor. Use to iterate through all nodes under and including the specified root node.

    This implementation does not use recursion, so a deep DOM does not risk blowing the stack.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      NodeTraversor(NodeVisitor visitor)
      已过时。 
      Just use the static filter(NodeFilter, Node) method.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NodeTraversor

        public NodeTraversor(NodeVisitor visitor)
        已过时。 Just use the static filter(NodeFilter, Node) method.
        Create a new traversor.
        参数:
        visitor - a class implementing the NodeVisitor interface, to be called when visiting each node.

    • 方法详细资料

      • traverse

        public void traverse(Node root)
        已过时。 Just use the static filter(NodeFilter, Node) method.
        Start a depth-first traverse of the root and all of its descendants.
        参数:
        root - the root node point to traverse.

      • traverse

        public static void traverse(NodeVisitor visitor,
                            Node root)
        Start a depth-first traverse of the root and all of its descendants.
        参数:
        visitor - Node visitor.
        root - the root node point to traverse.

      • traverse

        public static void traverse(NodeVisitor visitor,
                            Elements elements)
        Start a depth-first traverse of all elements.
        参数:
        visitor - Node visitor.
        elements - Elements to filter.

      • filter

        public static NodeFilter.FilterResult filter(NodeFilter filter,
                                             Node root)
        Start a depth-first filtering of the root and all of its descendants.
        参数:
        filter - Node visitor.
        root - the root node point to traverse.
        返回:
        The filter result of the root node, or NodeFilter.FilterResult.STOP.

      • filter

        public static void filter(NodeFilter filter,
                          Elements elements)
        Start a depth-first filtering of all elements.
        参数:
        filter - Node filter.
        elements - Elements to filter.
